mapper:
<select id="Select_item_code" resultType="List<ikcoder.entities.coredb_basic.DTO.DTO_inst_mapinfo">
        select * from inst_mapinfo where inst_code=#{inst_code}
    
    <select id="select_inst_id" resultType="List<ikcoder.entities.coredb_basic.DTO.DTO_inst_mapinfo">
        select * from inst_mapinfo where inst_code=#{id}
    
    
        insert into inst_mapinfo(inst_code,docid_basic) values(#{inst_code},#{docid_basic})
